metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6815 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers reported memory safety and script safety bugs present inFirefox 73. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption orescalation of privilege and we presume that with enough effort some ofthese could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 74.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
